projects.title: Noggin
projects.bodyText:
- A learning platform for kids led by their favorite characters.
 - Parents can monitor their kids learning.
 - Parents can manage their kids contents for learning.

projects.title: T3 Innovation Network - DESM
projects.bodyText:
- A schema converter application for the web 3.0.
 - An open source project.
You can interact by using drag and drop to easily build your own RDF schema.

projects.title: Teach Like a Champion Online
projects.bodyText:
- An application for education establishments to level up their teachers.
 - Different roles: admin, coach, teacher.
 - Option to assign courses to teachers to build a learning path for them.
.

projects.title: Troly
projects.bodyText:
-  A platform tailored for small and mid-size wineries and breweries.
 - Module based architecture.
 - Integrated with several API's like: Braintree, Fastway, UPS, Twilio, among others.

projects.title: LPx
projects.bodyText:
- A Platform designed to manage fund administration and investor relations.
 - Led a migration from a document based database engine to a relational one.
 - Acted as a technical leader.
 - Used libraries for PDF generation and document cloud storage.

projects.title: Frontline - Find a Vet
projects.bodyText:
- An web embedded application to track veterinarians in the map.
 Wrote a microservice to store the veterinarians locations.
 Connected the service to the embedded application to only show the vets around the user's current location.
 Conducted technical interviews.
